means: 欺骗( beguile的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His paintings beguiled the Prince of Wales.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的画把威尔士亲王给迷住了。

sentence.Network_en: She beguiled them into believing her version of events.
sentence.Network_cn: 她哄骗他们相信了她叙述的事情。

sentence.Network_en: He beguiled me into signing this contract.
sentence.Network_cn: 他诱骗我签订了这项合同.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The old sailer beguiled the boys with stories about his life at sea ., 老水手给孩子们讲自己海上生活的故事 , 来哄他们高兴.
The swindler beguiled her out of all her savings ., 那个诈骗犯骗走了她的全部存款.
Our journey was beguiled with pleasant talk ., 我们在旅行中用欢快的交谈来消磨时间.
She was beguiled of her money ., 她的钱给骗走了.

list.abs: always the purpose with detinue , although adopted beguiling method , also attribute civil dispute , do not answer with punish of crime of fraud .凡是以非法占有的目的，即使采取了欺骗的方法，也属于民事纠纷，不应以诈骗罪论处。
how can you just be opposite of sadness are oneself laughed to forget at theat the same time by beguiling thing ?怎样才可以对悲伤的自己被欺骗的事情一边笑一边去忘记？
execute the law personnel will ask accordingly agency make a specification , to prevent " flaw " car appears on the market beguiling consumer .执法人员将据此要求经销商做出说明，以防止“瑕疵”车辆上市欺骗消费者。
He beguiled me parting with the gem ., 他诱骗我把那枚宝石割爱.

entry.def: If something beguiles you, you are charmed and attracted by it.

example.ex: His paintings beguiled the Prince of Wales...
example.tran: 他的画把威尔士亲王给迷住了。

example.ex: I was beguiled by the romance and exotic atmosphere of the souks in Marrakech.
example.tran: 我被马拉喀什露天市场的浪漫情调和异域风情深深地吸引了。

entry.def: If someone beguiles you into doing something, they trick you into doing it.

example.ex: He used his newspapers to beguile the readers into buying shares in his company.
example.tran: 他利用他的报纸诱骗读者买他公司的股票。

auth_sentence.content: She is the sylph who beguiled Patou—reckless Daisy reborn as the Flapper.
auth_sentence.res_content: She is the sylph who beguiled Patou—reckless Daisy reborn as the Flapper.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She is the sylph who beguiled Patou—reckless Daisy reborn as the Flapper.

auth_sentence.content: With the help of Emma Watson and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Burberry has beguiled female luxury spenders.
auth_sentence.res_content: With the help of Emma Watson and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Burberry has beguiled female luxury spenders.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With the help of Emma Watson and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Burberry has beguiled female luxury spenders.

auth_sentence.content: Though beguiled by Zen and other Eastern philosophies, Klein was a pious Catholic, with eccentric trimmings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Though beguiled by Zen and other Eastern philosophies, Klein was a pious Catholic, with eccentric trimmings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Though beguiled by Zen and other Eastern philosophies, Klein was a pious Catholic, with eccentric trimmings.
